Articles.Content:
I want to know whenever a new vessel was launched and how much it cost.

Is onNewVesselCreated the correct game event to subscribe to?

Is there an easy way to get the total cost of a vessel?

I'll anwer my own question in case anyone finds this some time.

GameEvents.OnVesselRollout(EventData<ShipConstruct> is the callback I need. And ShipConstruct.GetShipCosts(out dryCost, out fuelCost) provides the costs
